item.title: Jail Command Problems. =\
item.dc:creator: @cal01 cal01
item.description:
@cal01 wrote:

This Is My Jail Code. It Works, and Tele-Blocks… But when they log out and back in, they can get out. I was wondering if I am able to make it so they can either, A- Not Log Out, or B- Stay TeleBlocked even after logging out? It Is a Deltascape source.

if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Owner CC } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2520; c.teleportToY = 4777; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 30, 2009, 03:14:36 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
